body: I find it hard to find artists willing to draw bras for more than a few pages and angles. And that's a missed opportunity, since a beautifully-wrapped pair greatly enhances the experience IMO.
I have this entire file on my computer. One of my girlfriend(who is a year older than me) found it and read it. Needless to say I didn't get any sleep that night. Worth it.
Its like watching vanilla facemelt with a marshmallow.... how glorious it is.
